body: This story doesn't seem too bad. I wonder how the author will end the series. Hopefully everything turns out alright
Also the author need to pop those new chapter fast i need my mahwa crack soon while waiting on those even longer release of HXH manga.

Read the chapter til chapter 21,still not quite sure what happen in the past.The conclusion or finally better have a happy ending or i am gonna lose it,the japanese already make to many sick NTR and with an even more brutal ending,hope the korean wont follow them give a tragic character a happy ending so that we could conclude the beautiful story on a good note. A happy ending is it to much to ask for a fiction.sigh..
Feeling blue about missing out on blue hair sex.
my theory is, knowing koreans common view on abortion, she aborted the MC child, that's why she's trying to get pregnant. the rumor that she's keep getting abortion isn't confirmed yet.
I fucking hate this because I cant fap to it...but yet I love it so god damn much. These fucking hoes man
Missed translating 2nd to last page!  I love this series.  So sad and yet so beautiful.
I think she's punishing herself for whatever it was she did to the male MC that the blue-haired ex mentioned.
I wonder what the fucked happened to her to make her want to live like that.. She had a good life seemingly.. Even her coworkers know that much..
